item.title: Blog: June 2021 Release
item.description:
public release Implementation Packages update for Unity of the TIBCO LABS™ Project ART, containing:

  • add CIC oAuth implementation support to TIBCO Cloud™ Live Apps - Unity3D Package
  • work in progress details about upcoming Unity3D Package
  • ongoing Exploration updates

please have a look back soon here, and check our Roadmap.

item.title: Blog: CiC Exploration
item.description:
adding TIBCO Cloud Augmented Reality Exploration

based on Hololens 2 connected to TIBCO Cloud Services.

item.title: Blog: May 2021 Explorations
item.description:
We started 2021 with 2 Explorations, one using Web AR technologies, and one more using Hololens 2

  • Hololens and Computer Vision
  • ScanSmart AR Web, for online event gamification

item.title: Blog: Marker Exploration
item.description:
Augmented Reality without special Devices needs, or native Apps is possible today.
Check out or latest LABS Surprise Implementation here

AR with pure HTML, CSS and Javascript, connected to TIBCO Cloud Services.

item.title: Blog: Nimbus Exploration
item.description:
adding TIBCO Cloud Nimbus Augmented Reality Exploration

based on Hololens 2 connected to TIBCO Cloud Services.

item.title: Blog: WebXR Exploration
item.description:
Augmented Reality without special Devices needs, or native Apps is possible today.
Check out or latest LABS Demo Implementation called ARTwalker

AR with pure HTML, CSS and Javascript, connected to TIBCO Cloud Services.

item.title: Blog: 3nd September 2020 Release
item.description:
third public Implementation Packages for Unity of the TIBCO LABS™ Project ART, containing:

  • add browse cases incl. attachments, implementation to TIBCO Cloud™ Live Apps - Unity3D Package
  • work in progress details about upcoming Unity3D Package

We are glad having in the meantime three Hololens V2 devices.
Next, we started to work with WebXR as well, to support all kind Devices near future.

please have a look back soon here, and check our Roadmap.

item.title: Blog: 2nd April 2020 Release
item.description:
second public Implementation Packages for Unity of the TIBCO LABS™ Project ART, containing:

  • add publish messages sample implementation to TIBCO Cloud™ Messaging - Unity3D Package
  • add Hololens 2 Sample Implementation Unity Project for TIBCO Cloud™ Messaging

please have a look back soon here, and check our Roadmap.

item.title: Blog: first Release 2020
item.description:
first public Implementation Packages for Unity of the TIBCO LABS™ Project ART, containing:

  • TIBCO Logo Package.
  • 3D Charts, that can be used in AR Implementations for Hololens and ARCore.
  • TIBCO Cloud™ Messaging - Unity3D Package and Samples

please have a look back soon here, and check our Roadmap.

item.title: Blog: Spotfire Exploration
item.description: running TIBCO Cloud Spotfire in AR is possible, check here.

item.title: Blog: Initial Release 2019
item.description:
first private Implementation Packages for Unity of the TIBCO LABS™ Project ART, containing:

  • TIBCO Logo Package.
  • 3D Charts, that can be used in AR Implementations for Hololens and ARCore.
  • TIBCO Cloud™ Messaging - Unity3D Package and Samples

working on legal reviews and internal approvals, going public.

item.title: Blog: Bike Exploration
item.description:
check out our Bike Exploration for the international women pro cycling team “Team TIBCO Silicon Valley Bank”

based on Hololens 1 connected to TIBCO Cloud Services.
